thread.title: BRIEF-GM Announces Production Plans For Self-Driving Vehicle Manufacturing In Michigan‍​

title: BRIEF-GM Announces Production Plans For Self-Driving Vehicle Manufacturing In Michigan‍​
text: March 15, 2018 / 3:16 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-GM Announces Production Plans For Self-Driving Vehicle Manufacturing In Michigan‍​ Reuters Staff March 15 (Reuters) - General Motors Co: * TO BUILD PRODUCTION VERSIONS OF CRUISE AV AT ORION TOWNSHIP ASSEMBLY PLANT IN MICHIGAN * ROOF MODULES FOR GM’S SELF-DRIVING VEHICLES WILL BE ASSEMBLED AT ITS BROWNSTOWN PLANT‍​ * SAYS WILL INVEST MORE THAN $100 MILLION TO UPGRADE BOTH FACILITIES * PLANS TO COMMERCIALIZE CRUISE AV IN 2019‍​ * ROOF MODULE PRODUCTION HAS BEGUN; PRODUCTION OF FOURTH GENERATION CRUISE AV EXPECTED TO BEGIN IN 2019 * ORION PLANT WILL CONTINUE TO BUILD CHEVROLET BOLT EV AND SONIC AS WELL AS CRUISE AV‍​ Source text : ( bit.ly/2pjLNBJ ) Further company coverage:
